name: Flashing Maintenance Mek Bait
desc:
A unique type of Trap said to utilize technology developed by the Fontaine Research Institute. Equipped with a metal protective cage and hook bars, the device contains a light made from Marcotte extract.

When tossed in water, the light flashes at a certain frequency to attract nearby Maintenance Meks, which are often referred to as "Water Maintenance Fish" or "Iron Fish." Maintenance Meks have powerful bites, but they are only able to bite onto the specially made external bars which hook them firmly in place. The contraption is essentially a special kind of bait designed to catch valuable "Iron Fishes."

Suitable for catching Maintenance Meks.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

customize.name: Iron Chunk
customize.desc: This iron chunk can be turned into a multitude of handy items in the hands of a skilled craftsman.

customize.name: Formula: Flashing Maintenance Mek Bait
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Flashing Maintenance Mek Bait.

customize.name: Delaroche
customize.desc: The director of the Fontaine Fishing Association. She was unanimously elected due to her experience as a former clerk at the Fontaine Research Institute and valuable contributions to the association by providing unused equipment from the Institute.
